events.name: Opening community center in Galim: Mandela Clinic
events.about: Anyone living in Galim, Bagam, bati, bamenyam and its surroundings. GLCH welcomes you to the Mandela clinic.

events.name: First GLCH Gala: Health is priceless but illness is
events.about: Why wait until you are sick to go to the hospital, with GLCH We help prevent your illness before it appears
